title: 求教，1.47forge api根本不能装
author: mxdorbnb
txt_content:
本帖最后由 mxdorbnb 于 2013-3-13 16:05 编辑 


装到崩溃了，1.46的forge也试过了， 还是不行，看过之前的帖说lib缺了3个文件(argo-2.25.jar asm-all-4.0.jar guava-12.0.1.jar)，也下了，还是没用

replies.author: ylqx1997
replies.txt_content:
mxdorbnb 发表于 2013-3-13 20:38 
我发出来了已经
下载这四个文件2013-03-13 16:53:14 [SEVERE] [ForgeModLoader] *** Download http://files.minecraftforge.net/fmllibs/argo-2.25.jar
2013-03-13 16:53:14 [SEVERE] [ForgeModLoader] *** Download http://files.minecraftforge.net/fmllibs/guava-12.0.1.jar
2013-03-13 16:53:14 [SEVERE] [ForgeModLoader] *** Download http://files.minecraftforge.net/fmllibs/asm-all-4.0.jar
2013-03-13 16:53:14 [SEVERE] [ForgeModLoader] *** Download http://files.minecraftforge.net/fmllibs/bcprov-jdk15on-147.jar

replies.author: mxdorbnb
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 mxdorbnb 于 2013-3-13 16:05 编辑 


在线等救助

replies.author: mxdorbnb
replies.txt_content:
ylqx1997 发表于 2013-3-13 16:07 
表示图片看不到
已经改地址了

replies.author: ylqx1997
mxdorbnb
replies.txt_content:
there was a fatal error starting up minecraft and FML

Minecraft cannot launch in it's current configuration
Please consult hte file D:\minecraft\1.4.7\.minecraft\orgeModLoader-client-0.log for fucher information

replies.author: mxdorbnb
replies.txt_content:
ylqx1997 发表于 2013-3-13 16:12 
还是看不见
我全打出来了= =

replies.author: mxdorbnb
replies.txt_content:
ylqx1997 发表于 2013-3-13 16:25 
应该是mod和api的版本不符
可是我下的都是1.47版本啊？

replies.author: ylqx1997
replies.txt_content:
mxdorbnb 发表于 2013-3-13 18:34 
可是我下的都是1.47版本啊？
能把你D:\minecraft\1.4.7\.minecraft\orgeModLoader-client-0.log这个文件里面的内容复制上来吗？

replies.author: mxdorbnb
replies.txt_content:
ylqx1997 发表于 2013-3-13 16:40 
能把你D:\minecraft\1.4.7\.minecraft\orgeModLoader-client-0.log这个文件里面的内容复制上来吗？
没有这个文件啊
